Author: Bandige
Title: [ANN] [PRE-ICO] AVAQVA | Functional water with unique health benefits
Body: AVAQVA WEBSITE | WHITE PAPER | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | MEDIUM | TELEGRAM ANN     WHAT IS AVAQVA?  Avaqva - is a series of revolutionary functional drinking waters for maintaining a healthy lifestyle and preventing diseases. Avaqva is produced by a special technology with the use of natural ingredients which enrich water with a balanced composition of vital catalytically active trace elements. It took us 15 years of research and 7 million dollars to develop functional products with healing properties approved by pre-clinical and clinical trials.  The special feature of Avaqva is a combination of unique health benefits and a possibility of daily consumption as a tasty drinking water without restrictions,contraindications and side effects. Currently Avaqva product line consists of 4 functional drinking waters offering truly effective solutions for the prevention of diabetes, pre-diabetes, obesity, diseases of cardiovascular system and gastrointestinal tract as well as the improvement of body’s immune status.     VISION  We build the first international brand of functional waters and products. Our vision is to connect physical product with digital infrastructure designed to simplify and protect the production process, as well as to provide our customers with a convenient information environment which will help maximize the effectiveness of Avaqva consumption. We believe that our products and technologies will revolutionize water consumption and help people become healthier.   TECHNOLOGY  To produce functional waters we use a special technology which includes the application of water treatment equipment “Avaqva Box” with natural ingredients “Avaqva Essentials”. By changing the physico-chemical parameters of water and its mineral composition, the water obtains new physico-chemical functions and energy states, acquiring healing properties and health benefits.     MARKET  The special feature of Avaqva is a combination of unique health benefits and a possibility of daily consumption as a drinking water without restrictions and side effects that opens a new niche at the crossway of bottled water and healthcare industries:  - Bottled water and functional beverages constituting together a 300+ billion dollars market with a projected growth of 40% by 2020;  - Healthcare: one of the most serious problems that Avaqva is especially valuable for is diabetes. Diabetes-related health expenditure amounts to 12% of global health expenditure (726+ billion dollars in 2017). 425 million adults are estimated to currently have diabetes, and this number is projected to grow by almost 50% by 2045.   CURRENT PROJECT STATUS  Developed unique products with healing properties approved by pre-clinical and clinical trials; Successfully carried out pilot sales; Project is ready to be launched on a large scale: established relationship with bottlers to co-pack the product, with the leading broker and distributors to present the product to all classes of trade both in Russia and the US. The projected revenue amounts to 300-1300 million dollars in 5 years depending on the investment amount.   DEVELOPMENT PROSPECTS & BUSINESS MODEL  Our innovative production technology allows to manufacture Avaqva anywhere in the world and quickly enter new markets, while the unique natural ingredients used in the production process enable the development of new types of effective functional waters and products.  The main features of our business model are the production of end-product by outsourcing bottling capacities and internet-driven distribution along with the traditional retail at physical sales points. For the rapid global expansion our long-term goal is to create an international network of bottlers using franchising model and licensing strategy that enables a rapid global expansion with much lower capital costs.   FUNDRAISING  We see ICO as the most effective type of fundraising, which allows both raising the necessary amount of funds, and generate global awareness of Avaqva. ICO has shown an explosive growth on the capital market in terms of fundraising volumes, and we want to use this opportunity in order to maximize the amount of funds raised to develop the project at a faster pace and enter new markets.  Our goal is to raise up to 19 million dollars through emission of tokens representing the right to receive dividends of the company. We invite you to participate in a socially-valuable project which has an already developed product with unique proven health benefits, successful pilot sales and arrangements on Avaqva production and sales. Our project does not involve the development of blockchain technology and we do not pursue the goal of implementing it where it makes no sense. Nevertheless, we see the potential for using blockchain and cryptocurrencies in such areas of our project as bottle authentication (anti-counterfeiting), product quality control, payment for goods, etc. The decision on the implementation of technology will be made on the considerations of its maturity and economic expediency.   TEAM  Avaqva team consists of highly skilled and passionate specialists knowing how to produce healthy functional water and make this business profitable. It has a broad experience in water production and launch of several major US brands,  e-commerce, digital innovation, retail and marketing. View team members here.  AVAQVA TOKEN  Avaqva token (AVQ) represents the right to receive dividends, formed from the company's net proﬁt. All AVQ holders are eligible for obtaining dividends according to their stakes. AVQ is also convertible-into-stake token (see "Legal Aspects" section in  white paper)      TOKEN SALE DETAILS      AVAQVA WEBSITE | WHITE PAPER | FACEBOOK | TWITTER | MEDIUM | TELEGRAM ANN
